title: WTB: T206 SGC Lajoie Portrait GOT ONE!
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 SGC Lajoie Portrait GOT ONE!
posts.post_content: Anyone have a T206 Lajoie portrait in SGC 40 or 50 for sale? There is a 40 on ebay for $350 right now but I'd rather buy from the board if poss. Let me know if you have one & thanks!

I would think you would have a fighting chance w the lower grade Lajoie. Johnson would be more and Cobb you'd need to not eat for a few months probably..haha to get one, even low grade. 

Try flea bay..they may have one, if nobody on here can help you.

Good luck sir from one low budgeted guy to another!:o
